mein forbes magazine ne sab se ziyada qabil e qadar kam umer artists ki top of the list mein emma watson ko number par rakha
emma watson apni zaati zindagi apne doston aur press se alag rakhti hai
is ka naam abhi tak kisi celebrity ke sath nahi jorha ja saka hai
emma watson ne modeling ke maidan mein bhi qismat aazmai hai lekin filhaal wo aik american university mein apni taleem mukammal kar rahi hai
aik interview mein inho ne kaha tha mujhe shohrat nahi gumnami chahiye
abhi wo aam talba o talbaat ki tarah zindagi guzaarna chahti hai aur filhal inho ne acting tark kar di hai
apne career ke mustaqbil ka faisla wo taleem mukammal hone ke bad he karega
jinhe beyk waqt urdu aur punjabi films mein kamiyabi mili thi

aik mauseeqar gharane se talluq rakhne wale munir hussain ke sage mamo rasheed atrey pakistan ke azeem tareen mausiqar the jab ke in ke khala zaad bhai safdar hussain bhi aik aala paaey ke mausiqar sabit hue

munir hussain ko apni pehli he naghmati film saat lakh ke famous zamana sada bahaar geet lautne wale to pyar ko tarsey ki recording ke liye in ke mamo rasheed atrey ne barhi tayyari karwai thi aur aaghaz he barha dhamaka khez sabit hua tha
jo is se qabal film heer aur ishq laila ke shahkar geeton ki wajah se suf awwal ke singer ban chuke the
thehar ja yaar da nazara leyn de munir hussain ke filmy career ka sab se maqbool tareen filmy geet tha
yeh sureela geet bhi mamo bhanjey rasheed atrey aur munir hussain ki mushtarka peshkash thi
munir hussain saleem raza aur mehdi hassan ki tarha classical mauseeqi par aboor rakhte the
lekin in dono se ziyada versatile filmy singer the
bollywood ke style icon shahrukh khan sirf naam ke hi king aur badshah nahi balke wo caroron madahon ke dilon par raj bhi karte hain
un ki muskurahat se le kar style statement tak har cheiz jese perfect hai aur dilchasp baat ye hai ke wo na sirf aik kamyab adakar hain balke aik kamyab producer aur mezban bhi hain

mini screen ke junior artist se le kar global icon banne tak unhon ne har shobe mein shuhrat aur kamyabi hasil ki chahe wo koi stage show ho ya film press conference ho ya kisi benul qawami university mein ki jane wali taqrir

shahrukh khan kisi bhi moqe par nazireen ko lutf indoz karne mein nakaam nahi howae aur agar in tamam baton ke elawa un ke style statement par nazar dali jaye to pata chalta hai ke wo bhi un ki tarah hi anokha hi hai

main rozana inhi kapron mein hota hun albata joton ke mamle mein meri makhsos pasand hai wo aramdah hun aur mere peeron ke size se kuch bare hun jahan tak jeans ki baat hai main ne phichle panch saalon se koi jeans nahi kharidi
to agar aap kabhi mujhe phathi hoi jeans pehne dekhein to ye nahi samjhiye ga ke ye koi naya fashion hai ya designer jeans hai balke wo to purani ho kar esi ho jati hain
aur mere khayal mein job hi ye zabardast combination pehan le wo fashion icon hai
mujhe nahi lagta ke aik hi jote bar bar pehnne mein koi borai hai
mujhe jote kharidne ka shoq hai magar koi si do joriyan hi bar bar pehanta hun
main to aik hi jori us waqat tak istemal karta hun jab tak wo kharab na ho jayein
mujhe dhehli dhali t shirts aur jeans pasand hain
jis ki wajah se un ke dil mein adakari ke bare mein dilchaspi paida hoti gai
us ke bad filmon mein kaam karne se un ka career mustehqam to howa lekin sahi maino mein uhnein film gia se maqboliyat hasil hona shuru hoi
jis ke bad un ki fimon ki kamyabi ka silsila shuru ho gaya
hell kitchen playing by hearts aur the bone collector un ki lagatar kamyab filmen thein

mein computer game tomb raider par bane wali film lara corft tomb raider mein lara corft ka kirdar ada karne ke bad un ki maqboliyat mein herat angez izafa howa aur unhein action heroin ke tor par jana jane laga
isi film ke secovil mein bhi angelina jolie ka kirdar bohat pasand kiya gaya
action filmon mein un ki mr and mrs smith wanted salt aur johnny depp ke muqable mein film tourist sab se ziyadah qabil e zikar hain
angelina jolie sirf aik kamyab adakara hi nahi balke insan dost shakhsiyat ki bhi malik hain
in ke falahi kaamon ki aur bosnia ki jangi qadiyon ke leye kaamon ki wajah se unhein united nations ke high commissioner baraye panah guzeen ne unhein apna khair sagali safeer muqarar kiya tha
angelina jolie ne iraq combodia aur afghan muhajreen ke leye bhi bohat kaam kiya aur un ki bahali ke leye record funds jama kiye
angelina jolie bar pakistan bhi aachuki hain pheli bar mein zalzala zadgan ki amdad ke leye jab ke dosri bar selab zadgan ki madad ke leye mein aai thein
is ke elawa angelina jolie ne duniya bhar ke qehat zadgan aftad ke leye bhi bohat kaam kiya
se wo siyasi satah par bhi america mein falahi kaamon mein sar garm hain
hollywood ki kai adakaraon ki tarah jolie li zaidagi mein bhi kai afrad se taluqat rahe hain
un ke bache hain jab ke unhon ne bache god bhi liye hain
angelina jolie ki zindagi ke kai phelo hain lekin unhein khas tor par insan dost adakar ke tor par jana jata hai

pakistan ki filmi sanat mein aur ki dehayon ko baja tour par waheed murad ka zamana qarar diya ja sakta hai ager chay iss dour mein santos darpan sudheer eajaz habib aur bad mein mohammed ali aur nadeem ne hi apni adakari ke jouhar dekhye lakin un mein se kio actor woh dastani hasiat ikhtiyar na ker saka jo waheed murad ko hasil hue
shayad iss liye ke waheed murad ki zati kahani aik mokammal aur kamyab almeay kay tamam anasir khud mein samoye huye hain

to kiya deegar hum asar actors ki zati zindagi mein koi dramai pehloo nahein tha mohammed ali radio pakistan hyderabad pe mahaz aik sada kar they zina ba zina taraqi ki manzilein tay ker tey aur badey mokhalif ki tandi se mardana war moqabla ker te huye aik din intehai shan o shaukat se parda e semein par namudar huye kiya yeh aik daramai kahani nahein hai nazir baig ko karachi lahore pindi kahein bhi radio ne ghas na dali aur unhein bharat par ker ke dhakey jana para jahan haftey mein aik adh bar radio par gazal ganey ka moqa mil jata tha lakin jab bharat kar ihtesham ki nazr e karam iss noujawan par pari to film chakori wajood mein aie aur wahi naujawan raton rat pakistan ka hero number wan ben geya jisey

ab ham nadeem key nam se jantey haien to keya nadeem ki dastan e hayat dilchasp nahein hay yaqinan yeh dono kahanyan jaddo jahad aur kamyabi ki azeem misalein haien jabkey waheed murad ko na to studio pahochney key leyeh kabhi bason aur rekshon mein dhakkey khaney parey aur na hi mangney key leyeh directron key der peyhazri deni pari woh to soney ka chamcha munh mein ley ker paida huey they aur apnay walid ki badaulat bees baras ki umer mein hi filmon key taqseem kar bun chukey they
baras ki umer mein woh chocolate hero ki shohrat ka maza cakh chukey they aur baras ki umer mein unhein pakistan ki pehli palatenium jubli ke kahani kar hero aur producer hone ka ajaz mil chukka tha

jo shaks zindagi ki sari kamyaban moqadder mein likhwaney ke bad iss duniya mein aya ho aur jisey shuhrat amm ki manzil tek pahonchney ke liyeh aik tinka na hilana paraho uski bazahir sedhi aur sapat zindagi mein awam ko kiya dilchspi ho sakti thi lakin haqeeqat yeh hay key apnay maddahon ki jetni bari khaip waheed murad ne tayar ki woh pakistan key kisi hero ko naseeb nahein hue yeh wahid hero tha jiskey maddahon ne monazzim hoker fan club tashkeel deay aur ajj is ski mout key itney baras bad bhi yeh maddah uski yad mein ijtemat ker tey haien uski filmon key khasusi show muaqid karatey haien uski qaber par hazri detey haien aur uskey nam par film award jari ker tey haien

waheed murad key walid nisar murad karachi mein kamyab distri bauter they mein waheed murad ne karachi university se ma english kiya aur uskey bad walid key karobar mein purey tour par shareek hotey huay apni pehli film aulad ka agaz keya jis key director sm yousuf they aur adakaron mein nayar sultana aur darpen shamil they waheed murad nay iss film mein aik roll bhi ada keya lakin in ki adakari key asal jaouher tab khuley jab un key dost parvaiz malik amrica se film sazi ka diploma ley ker lautey aur unhon nay waheed murad ki film heera aur patther ki hedayat kari key faraiz sanbhal leyeh

iss film mein waheed murad nay aik gadah gari waley ka kirdar ada keya jo key zaiba ki mohabbat mein giraftar ho jata hay film ko zaberdast kamyabi hasil hue aur waheed murad ko key behtareen adakar ka nigar award hasil hua
film arman nay bo office pe kamyabi key tamam guzashta record tor deay yeh pakistan ki pehli film thi iss ka geet na jana aur ko ko korina gali gali gunaya janey laga

waheed murad kam mangney key leyeh apnay puraney doston key pas to nahein gaey lakin issi dauran unka purana pathan driver aur ghareloo mulazim badar monir pashto filmon ka maroof star ban chukka tha balkey apni filmein bhi prodece ker raha tha namak halal molazim nay puraney malik se wafadari ka mozahra ker tey huey usey apni pashto film pakhtun pa wilayat kamba mein kam deya jo waheed murad ne qabool ker leya

johnny depp ko baja taur par filmy duniya ka kamao poot qarar diya ja sakta hai wo na sirf films ki kamiyabi ki alamat samjhe jate hain bal ke khus bhi sab se ziyada muaawza lene wale artists ki suff mein shamil hain
johnny depp apne fankarana salahiyaton ke balbotey par ab tak golden globe aur screen actors guild award samait mutaddid aezazaat hasil kar chuke hain
shakhsi sehar ke lihaaz se bhi johnny depp kisi dosri celebrity se piche nahi
people magazine ne aur mein inhe purkashish tareen mard qarar diya tha
mein johnny depp ko maqbool tv show jump street mein kaam karne ka mauqa mila jis ke bad kamiyabiyon ke darwazey in par khulte he chale gaey
lorry ne he apne sabiq boy friend actor nicholas cage ke zariye johnny depp ko filmy duniya mein mutarrif karwaya tha
ustaad nusrat fateh ali khan ne apni tamam umar qawali ke fun ko seekhne aur use mashriq o maghrib mein maqbool aam banana mein sarf kar di
inho ne soofiya e karam ke peyghamat ko duniya ke kone kone tak pohnchaya aur un ke faiz se khud unhe bepanah shohrat nasib hui
pakistan mein nusrat fateh ali khan ka pehla tarruf apne khandan ki riwayati rang mein gaai hui in ki ibtedai qawaliyon se hua

bad mein unho ne lok shaiyri aur apne hum asar shora ka kalam apne makhsoos andaaz mein ga kar mulk ke andar kamiyabi ke jhandey garhe aur us daur mein sun charkhe mithi mithi mithi kok mahi meyno yaad awanda aur sanson ki mala pe simron mein pee ka naam ne aam taur par qawwali se lagao na rakhne wale tabqey ko apni taraf raghib kiya aur yun nusrat fateh ali khan ka halqa asar o wasee tar ho gaya
nusrat fateh ali khan sahi maeyno mein shohrat ki bulandiyon par us waqt pohnche jab peter gabriel ki mauseeqi mein gaai gai
lekin kehte hai nusrat fateh ali khan ne apne walid ki wafat ke din bad he unhe khuwab mein dekha jis mein unho ne nusrat ko gaeyki ki takeed ki
us waqt nusrat fateh ali khan ki umar baras thi aur yun bator qawwal wo dunya e mauseeqi mein mutarif hue
in ki shuru ke salon ki gaeyki tasawwuf ke peyghamat se bharpor rahi
shaiyri se le kar mauseeqi tak in ki qawwali ka har juz samaa ki mukhtalif mehfilon mein ja kar is rohani kefiyat se faiziyab hui

is barey mein bharat ke mashoor filmsaaz aur mauseeqar muzaffar ali kehte hain ke nusrat ki awaz dilon mein ghar kar jati thi mashriq ho ya maghrib hindustan ho ya pakistan in ki awaaz ne tamam sarhaden torh di thi

nusrat fateh ali khan ne qawwali mein jiddat la kar maghrib mein barhe peymane par is sanaf ko mutarif karwaya aur is ke sath sath maghrib ke naamwar mauseeqaron ke sath mil kar apne fun ka muzahira kiya

kya is se in ki asal sanaf par koi asar parha muzaffar ali ka kehna tha ke qawwali mein bajne wale tamam saaz aik rang ya mizaj mein dhale hote hain un par izafi saaz dalna zabardasti dosra libas pehnane ke mutaradif hai
in ke aik maghrabi maddah ne aik dafa kaha tha ke nusrat ki gaeyki ap ko dawat deti hai chupke se kaan laga kar is guftugo ko sunne ki jo aik bandey air us ke rab ke darmiyan hoti hai

apne rab ke huzoor nazrana pesh karne kea mal lekin nusrat ko sunte hue hum mehaz aik bande aur us ke rab ki guftugo anhi sunte bal ke un ki gaeyki ka asal jado he yeh hai ke hamare dil in ki gaeyki ke utar charao ke sath dharakne kagte hain
in ke gaeyki mein zam ho jate hain aur hum rab ke huzoor us nazrane ke hissa ban jate hain wo gaeyki mein rab se guftugo karte hain aur humen bhi apne rab se hum kalam kar dete hain
speilberg abhi teen ager he the ke inho ne apne doston ke sath mil kar aik adventure movie shauqiya taur par banai thi
mein wo scout boy ban gae aur us dauran minute ki the last gun fight bana kar photography merit badge hasil kiya
inho ne scout master se pocha ke agar wo yeh kaam apne walid ki movie camera se kar len to kaisa rahega inhe ijazat mil gai ghaliban yehi in ki direction ke career ka nuqta aaghaz the
baras ki umer mein spielberg ne wartonowear naami minute ki film bana kar apna pehla award jeeta
baras ki umer mein inho ne apni pehli minute ki science fiction film fire light ki kahani likhi aur is ki direction bhi ki
jise maqami cinema mein numaiysh ke liye pesh kiya gaya aur is se dollar ka munafa hasil hua
isi kamiyabi se mutassir ho kar steven spielberg ne film close encounter banai jis ne bo office par acha business kiya
graduation karne ke sath he inho ne eagle scout ka rank bhi hasil kar liya
apne bachpan ke barey mein in ka kehna hai ke wo awail umer he se pukhta mazhabi aqaiyd rakhte the
usi waqt tak in ka kaam mehaz shauqia samjha ja raha tha
yeh pehli baqaida commercial film thi jis ki kahani bhi inho ne khud he likhi thi
yeh film bo office par super hit sabit hui aur inhe pehli bar behtareen director ke academy award ke liye nominate kiya gaya
is ke bad spielberg ne pehli jang e azeem par banne wali film ki direction ki
yeh film bhi blockbuster sabit hui aur yun spielberg ne kamiyabi ki shahrah par aise safar ka aaghaz kiya
jo tahaal pori raftaar ke sath jari hai
ibtedai daur mein spielberg ne apne walid ki jangi kahaniyon se mutassir ho kar dosri aalamgeer jang ke hawale se bhi kae films banai
jis ki kamiyabi ke bad inhe science fiction films ka mustanid director samjha jane laga
tahum inho ne khud ko sirf science fiction films tak he mehdood nahi rakha bal ke har mauzoo par filmy stories likhin direction ki aur kuch films produce bhi ki
steven spielberg samaji o falahi sargarmiyon mein bhi barh charh kar hissa lete hain
jinhe bilamoom saraha jata hai
in mein se beshtar bp office par kamiyab rahi hain
jo misaal ke taur par shark fishes ya dinosaurs ke muqabley mein kahi ziyada sanjeeda mauzoaat ka aahata karti hain
hum baaz auqaat aam dagar se hat kar apni nakamiyon se bhi waisi he mohabbat kar sakte hain jaisi ke kamiyabiyon se karte hain
is liye ke hum kamiyabi ke muqabley mein apni nakaami se kahi ziyada sabaq seekh sakte hain
mujhe paisa banane se nahi films banane se dilchaspi hai
aap behtareen kaam kijiye paisa khud chal kar aap ke paas aaega
is ke piche in ki barson ki mehnat aur gher mamooli salahiyatein hain
inho ne bilashuba apne mulk ki filmy history par gehre naqoosh murattab kiye hain aur in ke zikar ke bagher yeh tareekh mukammal nahi ho sakti
khud shahrukh khan ka is silsile mein yeh kehna hai ke major general shahnawaz in ke walid ke azeez the
wo batate hain ke in ke waldain ki mulaqat khasey filmy andaaz mein hui thi
walid sahib ne inhe na sirf hospital pohanchaya tha bal ke in ki jaan bachane ke liye khoon bhi diya tha
is accident ke badaulat hone wali shanasaai ka natija shadi ki soorat mein nikla
walid se in ki qurbat aur wabistagi bohat gehri thi
in ke inteqal ke sadmey ki shiddat apni jagah thi lekin isi saneha ki badaulat unho ne apne balbotey par zindagi guzaarne ka hunar seekh liya
jis mein wo khasey kamiyab rahe
jis ke tehat wo kae kamiyab films bana chuke hain
shahrukh khan falahi kamon aur imdadi sargarmiyon mein bhi hissa lete hain
khas taur par hospitals ko shahrukh khan bhari donations dete hain
shahrukh khan sirf apne mulk mein he nahi bal ke bohar se deegar mumalik mein bhi bohat maqbool hain aur india mein bo office par inhe number one samjha jata hai
shahrukh khan ki kamiyab tareen films ke naam yeh hain
inhe bachpan se he singing ka shauq tha
is awaaz ki kashish inhe kasha kasha sath wale ghar le gai jahan bachiyan apne ustaad se gana seekh rahi thin
kamsin iqbal bano chup ke se jaa kar is class mein beth gai aur ustaad ki awaaz ke sath awaaz milana shuru kar di
ustaad kehen lage yeh ladki agar singing seekh le to bohat acha gaegi
tab iqbal bano ke shauq ko ustaad ki raae ne jilaa bakhshi aur inho ne apne aehal e khana se kaha mujhe gana seekhna hai

aehal e khana ne jab yeh dekha ke iqbal bano ke is shauq ki wajah se in ki parhai mutassir ho rahi hai to inhe singing ki mashroot ijazat dete hue radio station par bachon ke program mein le jaya gaya
jab khandaan iqbal bano ke shauq ki raah mein mazeed rukawat na bana aur inho ne ustaad chand khan se classical singing ki baqaida tarbiyat leni shuru ki
dono ustadon se thumri aur daadra samait classical singing ki barikiyon se aagahi hasil ki
yehi wajah hai ke iqbal bano ke gaae hue geeton aur ghazlon mein classical rang numayan nazar aata hai
inqelabaat zamana ne iqbal bano ki awaaz ko kabhi mutassir nahi kiya bal ke mazeed nikhaar diya tha
wo apni zindagi ke aakhri saal tak gaati rahin aur daad samait ti rahin
taqseem hind ke kuch arsey bad wo shadi kar ke pakistan aa gai aur phir yahan inho ne radio film aur tv ke liye apni awaaz ka jadoo jagaya
jab film walon ne iqbal bano ki classical awaaz suni to in se rujoo kiya aur film ke liye gaane ki baqaida dawat di
tab aik sadabahar geet ne janam liya
tu laakh chale ri gori tham tham k film gumnaam ke is geet ke bad aik aur maqbool tareen geet iqbal bano ki awaaz se jawidaan hua
ulfat kin ae manzil ko chala tu bahein daal ke baahon mein anwar kamal pasha ki in dono films ki kamiyabi mein iqbal bano ki awaaz ka bohat dakhal tha
is ke bad iqbal bano ke pas films ki line lag gai lekin inho ne sirf muntakhib geet gaane ko tarjeeh di
isi liye inho ne films mein kam gaya lekin khob gaya
iqbal bano ne film ke liye kae khobsurat aur yaadgar naghme gaae
jin ka shumar sadabahar geeton mein hota hai
film ishq laila ke geeton ne to har taraf dhoom macha di thi
is film ke liye iqbal bano ne mausiqar safdar hussain ka compose kiya hua yaadgar geet gaya
sitaron tum to sou jao paresha an raat sari hai sapaid rangat aur dilkash naqosh ki malik iqbal bano ka ghazal aur thumri gaane ka apna khas andaaz tha jo inhe deegar gaane walon se mumtaz karta tha
rasio par iqbal bano ne usatza ki ghazlen gaane ko tarjeeh di
yun to iqbal bano ne barhe barhe shoara ka kalaam gaya magar mayanaz poet faiz ahmed faiz ki nazmon aur ghazlon ko inho ne is kamaal maharat ke sath gaya ke sunne walon par sehar taari ho jata tha
faiz ki is famous nazam ko iqbal bano ne khud he compose kiya aur itne khobsurat o dilkash andaaz mein gaya ke in ke naam ko zinda rakhne ke liye yehi kafi hai
dasht e tanhai mein ae jaan e jahan larza an hain teri aaghosh ke saaey tere honton ke saraab phir faiz ahmed faiz ki aik aur maqbool aam nazam

hum dekhenge lazim hai ke hum bhi dekhenge jab takht giraae jaenge jab taaj uchale jaenge in nazmon ko apni khobsurat aur munfarid awaaz mein gaa kar iqbal bano ne amar kar diya aur khud bhi amar ho gai
daagh dil hum ko yaad aane lage log apne diye jalane lage is ko iqbal bano ne itne dilkash andaaz mein gaya ke is mein chaar chand laga diye
iqbal bano ka aik yaadgar musical concert jaipur mein hua tha jab wo saarc ke tehat saqafti wafood ke tabadley ke hawale se pehli baar india gai thin
jaipur mein bohat barha auditorium tha october ka month tha sardi thin a garmi barha acha mausam tha
ab ke saawan ghar aa ja mera gana jari tha ke achanak barish ki boondein parhna shuru ho gai
mujhe aisa laga ke jaise moti tapak rahe hain
isi asnaa mein announcer ki awaaz sunai di jo keh raha tha ke pehle suna he suna tha lekin aaj hum dekh rahe hain ke meghraj mein iqbal bano thumri gaa rahi thin ke barish ho gai
iqbal bano ko classical aur neem classical bilkhusoos mere watan ke naujawan watan ke geet gaae jaa aur yeh apni zameen yeh apna watan sooraj ki tarah roshan roshan apni misaal aap hain
agar sawal kiya jae ke pakistan ke kisi fankaar ka naam batae jise radio television aur film ke hawale se aalmi shohrat hasil hai to jawab mein hamare paas sirf aik naam hai aur wo hai zia mohyeddin
theater ki mohabbat inhe kusha kusha london le gai jahan inho ne mein royal academy of dramatic arts mein drama ki baqaida tarbiyat hasil ki aur stage dramas ka aaghaz kiya
zia mohyeddin se meri dosti barson par muheet hai

jis shakhs ne sari zindagi nazreen aur tamashaiyon ke saamne apne funn ka muzahira karne mein guzari ho wo bhala sharmeela kis tarah ho sakta hai lekin haqiqat yeh hai ke zia mohyeddin sharmeele hain aur is silsile mein main apni taraf se kuch kehne ke bajae khud un ke alfaaz dohrana chahonga
main yeh baat is liye keh raha hon ke amoman log samajhte hain ke showbiz mein sharmile aadmi ka koi kaam nahi halan ke mera khayal hai ke mein to is maidan mein aaya he is liye tha
sakht sharmilapan aur namood o numaiysh ki khuwahish
sharmilapan he insaan ko apni zaat ke izhaar ke liye dosri chezon ka sahara lene par majboor karta hai
zia mohyeddin show apne daur ka behad maqbool aur meyari program tha
zia mohyeddin ka kehna hai ke mujhe is program ki maqboliyat ka andaza is roz hua jab main ne aik choti si bachi ko yeh kehte hue suna ammi ammi wo dekhen zia mohyeddin show ja rahe hain
zia mohyeddin barhi mehnat aur tehqeeq ke sath sawalaat tayyar karte the
nasir iqbal is waqat pakistan ke un chand khilariyon mein se aik hain jin se mustaqbil mein achi umeeden wabasta hain
wo pakistan squash ki tarikh ke wahid khilari hain jinein british open junior ki under championship jetne ka ezaz hasil hai
wo duniya squash mein junior satah ke kai muqabalon ke title apne naam kar chuke hain
april ko bannu mein paida hone wale pakistan number one nasir iqbal apne khandan ke wahid fard hain jo benul qawami satah par pakistan ki numaindagi kar rahe hain
unhein england mein hone wale london open aur malaysia mein hone wale royal cup ka title jeetne ka ezaz bhi hasil hai
duniya e squash mein ke ikhtetam par un ki world ranking thi tahum nasir iqbal ke azam buland hain aur bohat jald dunya ke top ten khilariyon mein shamil hone ke leye pori mehnat kar rahe hain

is tournament mein kaamyabi se mere leye squash kheelne ki rahein khulti gayein phir bad mein na sirf pakistan balke beron e mulk mein bhi junior title jeetne mein kaamyab raha hun

is par inhe mulk ki bad tareen jailon main se aik mianwali jail mein bhi kuch arsa rehna parha lekin inho ne apne awam dosti ke usool se kabhi rogardani nahi ki jis ke aeteraf mein inhe december ko karachi press club ne apna life member banaya aur in ke aezaaz main shandaar jalsa munaqid kiya
is ke ilawa inho ne filmi shaiyri mein bhi khoob taba aazmai ki maslan raqs zanjeer pehn kar bhi kiya jata hai zarqa aur zulm rahe aur aman bhi ho kya mumkin hai aesa bhi ho ye aman

ghalib un shura mein se hain jin ko har tabqe ne sar aankon par bethaya lekin ghalib ki nudrat aur buland khayali ko bayan karne ke leye ye kafi nahi kuch aur chaheye wossat mery bayan ke leye ap yun samajh len ke ghalib na hote to koi aur hota lekin wo ghalib na hota
mirza ghalib ne bara pur ashob daur dekha jo saltanat e mughliya ke zawal e akhir aur angrez ke mukamal tasalut ka zamana tha
mirz ghalib ki zati zindagi bhi masaib se pur rahi
ghalib ki shakhsiyat mushkil dor mein parwan charhi
mirza ghalib ki shayari ghalib ki shakhsiyat se photi hai
mirza ghalib ne jis pur ashob daur mein hosh sambhala us ka pora adrak mukamal dukh aur insanon par jo biti us ka bayan un ki shayari mein milta hai
ghalib ki shakhsiyat bayakwaqat admiyat aur insaniyat ke anasir se malamal thi
shidat e ahsas aur halat ke jabar se mehfoz rehne ka un ka apna tariqa tha aur ye zindagi se farar nahi balke us ka samna karne ke liye tha
ghalib ne darasal urdu ko zinda rakha hai
is zaban mein wo bayan kiya hai jis ki is se qabal nazir nahi milti
behad sanjidah mehsosat afkar aur khayalat ko yun bayan karna ke goya ye mere dil mein hai ghalib ka kamal hai
jab hum ajz e bayan ka shirak hote hain to ghalib ka koi sher humari madad ko ajata hai aur humare dil mka bojh halka kar deta hai
is ki wajah ye hai ke saqawat apni batni taqat par zindah rahti hai koi kisi ko majbor nahi kar sakta ke eee eeeye zaban apnao ya ye lebas pheno
ghalib aaj bhi is liye pasandedah hain ke wo un mehsosta ko jo hamari giraft mein nahi ate fankarana aur takhliqi chabuk dasti ke sath bayan kardete hain

ghalib ki infaradiyat aur sheri azmat ka sabot ye bhi hai ke un ki ungli tham kar kitne log bare shair to ban gaye lekin kisi ko un ki tusi qarar nahi deya ja sakta kyun ke wo apni jagah mukamal shayar hain aur un ka kamal un par khatam ho gaya
jo shakhs apne jazbe ahsas fiqar o khayal mein jitna shaded aur khara ho ga is ki tehrir o taqrir isi qadar mosar ho gi
ghalib ki shairi mein esi shidad e ahsas pai jati hai jo marizana nahi is se qonotiyat ka izhar nahi hotabalke ye fikar aur khayal angez hai
un ke har sher mein jahan e mani poshidah hota hai
asal mein takhliq ka matlab hi ye hai ke jo nahi tha is ko banaya jaye
duniya mein koi esa fankar nahi howa jo infiradiyat aur naye pan yani originality ke fuqdan ke bawajod bara ban gaya ho
har fankar ko create ya recreate kana parta hai
mirza ghalib ne shayari mein pora slob hi takhliq kar dala
humein ese tarz e shayari se roshanaz karaya jis ki phele koi nazir nahi milti
ghalib ki shayari part dar part aur teh dar teh kholti chali jati hai
is ki satahein itni ziyadah hain ke aik janib to un ka sher aam qari ko chota hai dosri taraf aala adbi zauq rakhne wale is ki gehri manuyat kea sir ho jate hain
goya sabhi sar dhunte hain mushkil pasandi un ka mizaj sahi lekin sher ki manuyat aur is mein mujod eee eeeshairi eee eee is par havi hoti hai

falsafyana mozuat ko unhon en jis aasani se sheri takhliq ke qalb mein dhala is ki misl na un se phele thi na un ke bad mein un ki shairi ki afaqiyat aur lafani hone ke leyeyehi dalil kafi hai ke wo aah ki nasal mein bhi maqbol hain

ye nasal kalam e ghalib ki is manuyat ko pa rahi hai jo is ke sciencesi dor ki zarorat hai kyun ke ghalib ki fikar darasal fitrat ke qarib tar aur sciencesi hai chunacha ye baat herankun nahi honi chaheye ke ghalib kisi sarkari sarparasti ke bagheir maqboliyat mein tamam shora se aage hain

ghalib ke kalam se shora ko ye sekhna chaheye ke apne dork o batin mein yun sachai se ameza aur mehsos kiya jaye ke khayal sheri takhliq ban kar baramad ho aur is mein kahein masnoi pan ka shuba tak na ho
yehi shairi na sirf apne dor ki tasveer hoti hai balke mustaqbil mein bhi zinda rahti hai
leki is ke leye taqatwar takhliqi shakhsiyat ki zarorat hoti hai kyun ke ye nihayat mushkil kaam hai
ghalib hama jahat takhliqi fankar the

maslan un ki shairana azmat nasar mein un ki barai ko kam nahi kar sakti un ki tamam hi tehriron mein wit jhalakti hai lekin nasar nigari mein ye kamal numaya hai
un mein nasar nigari ka khudadad johar tha
jis tarah un ki shairi anokhi hai un ke khotot bhi nasar nigari ken aye dor ka aghaz hain
un ke tarz e tehrir ne khat nawisi ko bilmushafa goftogo bana deya
ghalib ne gehre dukh ko mazah aur zarafat ki dhal ke zarye khud par hawi hone se roka
un ke khotot is ki waze missal hain
zarafat ke makhsos andaz ne un ke khotot ko dilchasp nasar nigari bana deya
ghalib ki takhliq taqat ka sab se bara sabot ye hai ke humari tehzib aur humare shaor par ghalib ka asar ghalib hai
ghalib par bohat likha gaya hai aur likha jata rahe ga haqeeqat to ye hai ke is azeem fankar par jitna likha jaye kam hai

inho ne dosri jang e azeem ke zamane mein fauji geet likhe the aur geet ko bhi inho ne nae peykar ata kiye

bilashuba ye ek pur asar geet hai kyun ke is mein jo alfaz istemaal kiye gae hai wo apni jagah par nageene ki tarha jarhe hue hai aur samaey ke dil par gehra asar chorte hai

ek tarha se inho ne ghazal ko fitri poshak ata ki

us ka urdu adab mein numaya maqam hai in ke bohat se ashaar sehl e mumtana ki hesiyat rakhte hai

janab ibn e safi bilashuba urdu ke sab se barhe jasoosi novel nigar hai aur in ki tehreeron mein aesa jadoo hai ke saal likhe gae novel jab aaj ke daur ka bhi insaan parhta hai to wo sab bhool jata hai
ibn e safi ka lagaya hua pauda imran series is qadar tanawar hua ke aaj tak yah samarbaar hai aur kae aik musannifeen is silsile ko aage barha rahe hai

koi mujh se pochta hai ke aap ibn e safi ke novel kyun parhte hai to main jawab deta hoon kyun ke ibn e safi hamare kae novel nigaron se behtar zuban likhte hai

ji han main doston ko apni zindagi ka aeham hissa samjhta hon
waise to sab se ache talluqaat hain
lekin bhai aur biwi mere qareebi dost hain
yeh bohat zarori hai ke agar biwi ko apna dost samajh kar us se har achi buri baat share ki jaey to aitemad barhega aur wo bhi apne aap ko aeham samjhegi
agar use kisi third person se koi baat maloom hui to use is liye aehmiyat nahi degi kyun ke wo pehle se is ke barey mein janti hai
lehaza hum biwi ko apna dost aur raazdar banae rakhen to sab se ziyada faiyda hum he ko ho ga aur ghar ka mahaul bhi pur sukoon rahega

abid ali ko pakistani tv screen ke golden dor ka numaindah adakar kaha jata hai
apni bhar pur awaz mardana wajahat aur purtasur chehre ke bais wo pheli hi nazar mein nazreen ko bha gaye
is ke bad unhon ne kamyab dramon ko aik qatar laga di balke ye kehna behtar ho ga ke aik zamane mein abid ali ki mojudgi kisi bhi drama ki kamyabi ki zamin samjhi jane lagi thi
atta shad ne abid ali mein chupe here ko bhanp liya aur un ki awaz ki tarifon ke pul bandhte howe unhen radio par kaam karne ki dawat di

lahore mein tv ki chamak aur glamour ki chakachond ne is nojawan ko apni bahon mein leya aur raaton raat shorat ki bulandiyan te karte howe abid ali tv ke mashhor fankaron ki fehrist mein shamil ho gaye
lekin tv par dakhla unhen kisi chor darwaze ya achanak chance ke zariye nahi balke mutadid bar audition ke marahil se guzarne aur apne intekhab ki merit sabit karne ke bad hi mila
is ke elawa bhi unhon ne tv ke sath sath pakistani filmon mein apni adakari ke johar dikhaye
fan e adakari ke shobe mein abid ali ko aik legend ki hesiyat hasil hai
wo guzarte waqat ke sath apni adakari mein tano paida karne ke mahir hain
chunacha unhon ne hollywood ke adakaron ki rah par chalte howe character acting par tawaja di aur chotte kirdaron ko bhi apni jandar performance se bara bana kar dikha diya
abid ali pakistan ke wo fankar hain jinhon ne pichle salon mein betakan kaam kiya aur adakaron ki naslon ke sath na sirf adakari ki balke nazreen ki naslon ko apne fan se mehzoz bhi kiya
wo aaj bhi kisi drame ke set par hon to nihayat inkasari aur piyar ke sath apne juniors ko apna fan aik ustad ki tarha muntaqil kar rahe hote hain
wo dheme lehje mein goftogo karne wale aik khush shakal khush libas aur khush goftar fankar hain
sirf kaam se kaam rakhna un ka style aur sab se dosti rakhna un ka mizaj hai
wo apne tabnak mazi se jure rehne ke bawajod jadid dor ke taqazon se bhi khud ko humahang rakhe howe hain
amoman log samajhte hain ke jhok siyal hi abid ali ki pheli serial thi halan ke sach ye hai ke unhon ne sab se phele saleem chishtti le likhe howe kheel zanjeer mein adakari ki
unhon ne aik ese dor mein shohrat hasil ki jab tv par aana aur adakari karna nihayat mushkil kaam tasawor hota tha
muqabla sakht tha aur bare bare adakaron ki aik lambi qatar phele hi apna naam bana chuki thi

is ki wajah ye thi ke wo dheme mizaj ke insan the aur kaam apni lagan se karte the

bushra ansari is a pakistani drama actress presenter host comedian singer and play writer also
she married with she started her career as a child star in children music show kalbon ki mala from ptv channel
first time bushra ansari performed in the iqbal ansaris drama and then she participated in the different shows and dramas of ptv channel
she played a nurse role in ward drama
bushra ansari well known from the anwar maqsoods drama as a role of bijli
bushra ansari performed in well known dramas like neeli dhoop kuch dil ne kaha makaan fifty fifty dolly ki aaegi baraat annie ki aaegi baraat mera naseeb bilqees kaur mere dard ko jo zuban mile etc
now she is working in the pakistan idol as a judge with hadiqa kiyani and ali azmat from geo tv

iss leye waqti tour per bhutto ko mana lea gia aur qoumi assembly mein unsay allan e tasqand ki hamayat bhi kerwai gai tahum june mein achanak unka istafa manzoor ker kay unhain farig ker dia gai

bila shuba iss waqt bhuto kay istafay say pori qaum ko sadma hua aur na sirf ayub khan ki amriyat bai naqab hui balkay awam kay jazbat ayub khan kay sakht khelaf aur bhutto ko mazloom qarar day ker un kay haq mein ho gaye chunanchay jab bhutto larkana jatay huye lahore railway station say guzray to un kay maddahon naray ki aik kasir tadad station per moujood thi

rajiv gandhi bomb blast ke natije mein chal base

is accident ne sonia gandhi ko bharat ki pur tashaddud politics se mutanfir kar diya aur inho ne congress ki janib se rajiv gandhi ki jaan nasheen banne ke liye dale jane wale dabao ki saliha saal tak mazahmat ki

wo nahi chahti thi ke in ke dono bachon rahul gandhi aur priyanka gandhi par khoon e siyasat ka manhoos saya bhi parhe lekin bil aakhir mein inhe party ke mustaqil dabao ke saamne himmat dikhani parhi aur wo congress ki intekhabi mohim mein hissa lene par aamada ho gai

sonia gandhi bharat ki pehli roman catholic prime minister ban sakti thin agar wo mein congress ki hairan kun intekhabi kamiyabi ke bad wazarat e uzmaa ka auhda qabool karne se inkaar kar ke sab he ko hairan na kar deti
congress ka dabao tha ke wo yeh mansab zaroor sambhalen lekin inho ne yeh kehte hue inkaar kar diya ke mere andar ki awaaz mujhe yeh auhda sambhalne se roak rahi hai
mein sonia gandhi parliament ki rukniyat se bhi mustaafi ho gai kyun ke mukhalfeen ne yeh mauqqif ikhteyar kiya tha ke wo national advisory council ki sarbarah bhi hain
is liye aaiyn ki roah se munfaat bakhsh auhdey apne paas nahi rakh sakti

agarcha council ke sarbarah ko koi tankhuwa adaa nahi ki jati is liye use muna fat bakhsh sarkari auhda qaraar nahi diya ja sakta lekin sonia gandhi ne khud ko tanazey se bachane ke liye parliament ki rukniyat aur council ki sarbarahi dono se he istefaa de diya

yon university campus mein aaye roz tashaddud ka silsilah shuro hogaya

karachi kay tamam ilaqon korangi golimar maler new karachi fb area nazimabad gizri kay tamam karachi mein mqm ka tuti bolnay laga

mein iss kay tashkeeli dour mein karachi mein lasani fsadat ka aagaz hua to mqm aik bari siasi jamat ki haisiat say samnay aie in fasadat nay altaf hussain ki shohrat aur badnami donon mein azafa kiya
sindh mein barhtay huay tashddud kay waqayat mein fouji operation ka agaz june ko hua
mqm apni suhrat ki wajah say iss operation ka khasusi nishana bani
iss daur mein mqm pur tashdud amaze siasat mein hissa lanay aur torture sell chalanay kay ilzamat lagaye gaye
altaf hussain aur un kay sathiyon par qatal aur dosray jaraim kay hawalay say moqadmat qaim keye gaye

iss daur mein altaf hussain aur unkay sathiyon kay darmian akhtalafat nay janam leya aur yuon alehdah afaq ahmed amir khan bader iqbal mansoor chacha nay alag hokar apni jamat mqm haqiqi ki buniad rakhi
amir khan kuch arsa pehlay janab altaf hussain aur unki jamaat muttahida qaumi movement say apni ghalti ki maafi mang kar muttahida mein shamil hogaye hain
youn altaf zardari bhai bahi ka nara samnay aya
altaf hussain aaj bhi london mein moqeem hain aur wahan party ke international secretariat se party ke muamalat chala rahay hain
altaf hussain par bohot say ilazmat lagaye gai hain
unhain dahshatgard aur qatil tak kaha gaya hai
tamam hukumaton ki taraf say unhain aik mujrim sabit karnay ki koshish ki gaie hai

naserullah babar imran khan aur zulfikhar mirza jaisay logon nay britannia jakar bhi unkay khalaf qanuni karwai kar nay ka alan kia lakin iss sab kay bawajud woh apni jagah par qaim aur mustehkam hain
altaf hussain ki maqbuliat mein har guzartay din kay sath azafa hi hua koi kami nahi aie aur na unkay mokhalif apnay tamam tar dawon kay bawajud unhain hilanay mein nakam rahay
altaf hussain pakistan say bahar honay kay bawajod pakistani siasat mein aik aham markaz ki haisiat rakhtay hain aur unki taqarer aur bayanat hamashah am o khas ki tawajjah hasil kartay rahay hain

pakistan mein nro kay silsilay mein jo shuro galga utha woh isi waqt thamnay mein aya jab janab altaf hussain nay nro ki mokhalfat kartay huye sadar e pakistan janab asif ali zardari ko mashwarah dia kay woh doston ki baat manain aur agar pakistan mein istehkam lanay kay silsilay mein unhain koi qurbani bhi daina paray to woh us say draig na karain
altaf hussain ki taraf say do tok alfaz samnay anay par aik dam sab kuch thanda par gaya aur wazeer e azam ki taraf say nro ko manzuri kay leye parliament mein pass na kar nay ka alan kar dia gaya

altaf hussain ka ye musbat faisla jahan unki sakhsiyat ko mazeed mustehkam kar nay ka bais bana wahein iss say ye bhi zahir hua kay pakistan mein na rehnay kay bawajud unki baton mein katna wazan aur ahmiyat rakhti hai
july ko zia ul haq nay pakistan mein martial law lagadia jis ki waja say zulfiqar ali butto ko takhtadar ka moun dakhna para aur benazir bhutto ko harasat mein lalia gaya
say tak ka arsa benazir bhutto nay mukhtalif jaloon mein qeaid o band ki sobatain jhaltay mukhtalif muqamaat per nazar band rehkar guzara
iss doraan inhun nay mah ki qeaid e tanhaye bhe kati
mein reha honay kay baad woh khud sakhta jila watni kay tehat saal kay lia england chali gayein
august mein woh apnay bhi shanawaz bhutto ki tadfeen kay lia watan lotein jissay france kay sahar canes mein zahar day kar halaq kardia gaya tha
december ko inn ki shadi asif ali zardari say hoye
kay intekhabat mein iji nay akasariyat hasil ki aur nawaz sharif wazeer e azam pakistan banay
march ko mulki halaat kay pesh nazar nawaz sharif nay apnay sathiyon samat wazarat e uzma say istafa day dia aur sadar ghulam ishaq khan nay assembly tehleel kardi

inn sab kay bawajud halat ki kashidgi barqarar rahi aur yeh kashedgi us waqt uroj per pahonch gaie jab benazir kay chotay bhai mir murtaza bhutto ko unki apni bahan kay ahde hukumat mein aik intahaye masqooq police maqblay mein sath sathiyon samat halaq kardia gaya
murtaza bhutto ki halaqat ko sarkari qatal qarar deya geya aur asif ali zardari ko iska zemma dar tehraya gaya
november mein sadar farooq ahmed leghari nay mukhtalif ilzamat kay tayhat benazir bhutto ko unkay uhday say mazol kar deya aur assemblyan tor dein
benazir bhutto per mukhtalif moqadmat qaym kar kay adalti karwai ki gae laykin issi dauran woh mulk say bahar chali gayein aur khud sakhtah jila watni ikhtyar kar li
moqadmat chaltay rahay aur asif ali zardari ko sal say zaid arsay ki qeid bhugatni pari

benazir bhutto aur jamhuraitnawaz sharif jab pervez musharraf ki kay shikar hokar jila watan honay per majbor huye to iss tajurbay nay unhain aur benazir bhutto ko bhi bahot kuch sochnay par majbur kar deya
ard nay general pervez musharraf ki hukumat kay khelaf bhar pur mazahmat ka alan keya

jab may mein london mein nawaz sharif aur benazir kay darmayan jamhurait par dastakhat huya jis kay tayhat donon nay jamhuryat ko bahal karnay aur aik dosray kay khaylaf istaymal na honay ka faisla keya

dosri pesh qadmi iss waqt huie jab july ko abu dhabi mein general pervez musharaf aur benazir bhutto kay darmeyan aik aham mulaqat huie jis kay baad peoples party ki chairperson taqriban sarah saal ki jila watni khatam kar kay october ko watan wapis ayein to unka karachi airport par faqedul misal istaqbal keya gaya
benazir bhutto ka karwan shara e faisal par mazar quaid ki janib barh raha tha kay achanak zordar dhamakay huye
inn dhamakon mein paunay do sau kay lag bhag afrad jan bahaq huye aur sankron zakhmi hoye
qiamat e sughra kay iss manzar kay dauran benazir bhutto ko bahefazat bilawal house paucha deya gaya peoples party ki chairperson jab apnay bachchon bilawal bakhtawar aur asifa say milnay
dobarahdubai gayein to mulk kay andar general parvez musharraf nay november ko emergency nafiz kar di
iss surat hal mein peoples party nay maidan khali na chornay ki hikmat amli kay tayhat tamam halqon mein umedwar kharay keye aur kaghzat e namzadgi jama karay

agar chay ard kay faislay kay tahat nawaz sharif nay bhi intekhabat mein hissah na lanay ka faisla keya tha lakin benazir bhutto nay unhain qayel keya kay herkaron ko khuli chott na de jaye aur halat khwa kaisay bhi hon intekhabat mein hissah zarur leya jaye

intekhabat mein chalaie janay wali mohim kay dauran december ko benazir bhutto liaqat bagh rawalpindi say aik jalsay amm say khitab kar kay bahar nikal rahi thein kay unki gari par fairing huie aur uskay sath hi aik falak sagaf dhamaka hua
benazir bhutto jo us waqt awam kay purjosh naron ka jawab daynay kay leye gari kay hawadan say bahar nikli khari thien buri tarha zakhmi huien aur thori hi dair mein khaliq e haqiqi say jamilien
khuch arsay baad nawaz sharif punjab kay sobai council ka hissa rehnay kay baad mein punjab kid sobia kabina mein bator wazeer e khazana huya
kay amm intaykahbat general election mein mian nawaz sharif qaumi aur subai assembly ki seaton pay bhari aksaryat say kamyab huye
april ko nawaz sharif nay panjab kay wazir e alla ki hasyat say halaf uthaya

iss kay sath sath mohtarma benazir bhutto ki hukumat kay sath sath unki ikhtilafat bhi chalti rahi unhon nay mohtarmah benazir bhutto kay khaylaf tahrek adam ataymad mein barh carh kar hissa leya lakin kamyabi hasil na kar sakay
markaz aur suba punjab kay darmyan kashidgi ki fiza baqarar rahi ta waqat kay august kay roze sadar ghulam ishhaq khan nay benazir buttu kid hukumat khatam kar deya
iss ithad nay intaykhabat mein numayan aksaryat say kamyabi hasil ki aur november kay roze nawaz sharif ko palimony leader chun leya geya
november ko nawaz sharif nay wazeer e azam ki haisiyat say halaf uthaya
app nay pehlay daur hukumat mein kaye aham aqdamat keye lakin iskay sath sath people party kay sath sath kashedgi ka silsila jari raha
mulk ki saisi surathal tahal puri tarah bahal nahein hui thi iss par hukumat aur aik bari siasi jamat ki mahaz arai nay jalti par tail ka kaam keya

benazir bhutto ki tarah nawaz sharif bhi panch saal puray nahi kar sakay aur president ghulam ishaq khan nay unki hukumat ko bhi taqriban unhi ilzamat kay taihat rukhsat kar deya jo pehlay benazir bhutto ki hukumat per lagaya gaya thay

agar chay mulk ki adalat e uzma nay aik ayni muqadmay kay baad unhain dobarah un kay uhday pay bahal to kar deya lakin phir bhi july mein sadar ghulam ishaq khan kay sath mian nawaz sharif ko bhi apnay uhday say istayfa dayna para
unkay daur e hukumat mein nawaz sharif datkar unki mukhalfat kartay rahay
nawaz sharif nay june ko qaumi assembly mein mehran bank scandal mein sadar pakistan kay maluwis honay kay sabot faraham keye

june ko bujat par bahas kartay huyae kaha kay bajat masakh shudah haqayaq ka majmua hay july ko aik baray jalsa e amm say khaytab kartay huay kaha kay ajj mulk ko tornay walon ki aulad aqtaydar mein hay

mujhay aqtaydar milay na milay unhain jana hoga unhon nay benazir hukumat kay khatmah kay leyeh tahryk najat ka alan keyah november ko parlimant kay mushtarkah ijlas mein apozishan ki janib say zabardast ahtayjaj hua aur sadar kay khaytab ka mokammal tour par batkat keya geya

november ko sadar farooq ahmad khan leghri nay benazir hukumat ka khatma kar deya aur february mein election kar waye un election mein mian nawaz sharif ko zabardast kamyabi huie aur woh dobarah wazir e azam bangaye kay intakhabat kay baad mulki ki tareekh mein pahli martabah koi wazir e azam atna bhari mended lay kar aqtaydar mein ayaiss matabah wazir e azam bantay hi nawaz sharif nay athwein tarmem ka khatma kar deya jis kay tayhat koi sadar hukumat ko khatam kar nay ka akhtayar rakhta tha

mulki satah par unhon nay utaro mulk sanwaro ki iskeem kay tayhat awam say paisay lay kar mulki qarzay utarnay ki mohim shuru ki jo agarchay kamyabi say hamkinar na hosaki lakin awami yaqjehti ka aik mazhar ban kar samnay aye

nawaz sharif dour mein bhi establishment kay sath nawaz sharif ki khan cha tani ka silsila jari raha pehlay chief justice supreme court sajjad ali shah say mian nawaz sharif kay akhtalafat huye jis mein unhain kafi kamyabi rahi iskay baad fouj kay sar barah general jahangir karamat ko unhon nay rukhsat keya

inn kamyabiyon nay unkay ataymad ko barah deya aur unhon nay pak fouj kay dosray sarbarah general pervaiz musharraf ko bhi chand ikhtilafat ki bina par bar taraf kar na chaha lakin iss martaba unhain kamyabi hasil na hosaki
general pervaiz musharraf ki sarbarahi mein unkay khaylaf fouji bagawat huie aur fouj ka kirdar qaumi sayasat mein kam kar nay ki yeh dyanat daranah koshish unkay leyeh afat ban gaie
october ko fouj ki taraf say nawaz hukumat khatam honay kay bad nawaz sharif par moqadma chala jo shazish case kay nam say mashoor huya
iss mein agwa aur aqdam e qatal kay ilzamat shamil thay
pervez musharraf kay sath aik khufia mohaiday kay baad nawaz sharif saudi arab chlay gaye

aik arsa tak nawaz sharif jaddah mein moqem rahay iss kay bad mulk mein jamhuryat ki bahali kay leye unhon nay mohtarma benazir bhutto kay sath milkar koshishon ka agaz keyah aur meshaq jamhuryat ki shakal mein aik tarykhi dasta wyz samnay layeh

august ko adalat nay sharif khandan ki darkhast par fayslah sunatay huay unki watan wapsi par hukumty aytayrazat rad kartay huyae puray khandan ko watan wapsi ki ayjazat daydi iss say pahlay nawaz sharif ki watan wapsi ki aik koshish nakamy say hamkinar hochuki thie bahar hal iss martabah unhain apnay maqsad mein kamyabi hasil huie aur november ko woh apnay khandan kay himrah lahore pahonch gayae
nawaz sharif nay un intaykahbat mein bazat e khud hissah nahi leya magar aik aham quait kay tour par seyasi manzer namay par moujud rahay

wukla tehreek kay daouran mazole chief justice iftekhar muhammad chaudhry ki bahali kay leye nawaz sharif nay bhar pur balkay kalidi kirdar ada keya iss kay alawa nro jaisay badnam zamana qanun ko parliament say manzoor nahi karwanay kay silsilay mein bhi mian sahab ka kirdar sab say zayadah ahmeyat kay hamil raha
iss waqt woh go mulk ki sarbarahi kay uhday par fayz nahin lakin agar ahmyat kay aitabar say daikha jaye to nawaz shareef ko pakistani sayasat ki sab say aham saksiyat qarar deya jasakta hai
in ki private zindagi ke is kamzor pehlon ki tasdeeq marcus mabry ne bhi ki hai

condoleezza rice auhd o shabaab mein aik naujawan american footballer rick upchurch se raah o rasam rakhti thin lekin aik arsey tak saath rehne ke bad inhe yeh bataya gaya ke mazkoora naujawan se in ki shadi kamiyab nahi hogi chunache inho ne is se laa talluqi ikhteyar kar ke shadi na karne ka faisla kar liya par wo taa haal qaiym hai

baras ki umar mein jab inho ne apne barey mein khud faisle karne shuru kiye to inho ne is haqiqat ka bhi saamna kiya ke musalsal koshishon ke bawajood wo piano bajane mein itni maharat hasil nahi kar sakin ke inhe professional pianist qarar diya ja sake chunache pianist banne ka khayal dil se nikaal kar inho ne shobaa siyasiyat ka rukh kar liya
tahum bad mein barhe paimane par tabahi phelane wale hathiyar baraamad na hone par condoleezza rice ko zabardast tanqeed ka saamna karna parha

condoleezza rice par is hawale se bhi tanqeed ki jati hai ke inho ne he america ke khilaaf sargarmiyon mein mulawwis alqaida ke arkaan ke khilaaf water boarding jaise azziyat rasani ke jadeed aur mohlik tariqe istemal karne ki tajveez bush administration se manzoor karai thi

condoleezza rice ke khayalat ke tanazur mein in ka shumar america ke qadamat pasand aur riwayaat pasand logon mein kiya ja sakta hai maslan george bush ki sadarti mohim ke dauran wo aelania kaha karti thi ke isqaat hamal par pabandi aaiyd honi chahiye
rice ne isqaat hamal ke khilaaf mohim chalane wale logon aur tanzeemon ko fund dene ki himayat karte hue kaha tha
condoleezza rice ko awaiyl umer mein apni siyah rangat ke baiys nasli imtiaz ke waqeyaat ka bhi saamna karna parha tha
inhe hotel mein kam darjey ka kamra diya jata
departmental stores mein goron ko fauqiyat di jati aur restaurant mein inhe qadrey veeraan nashiston par khana khana parhta tha
aur mein inhe duniya ki sab se taqatwar khatoon qarar diya gaya jab ke mein inhe mazkora list mein germany ki chancellor angela marker ke bad dosre number par rakha gaya
hindu se shadi hona bohat mushkil amar tha
mein india chor do quit india tehreek ke dauran bhi wo gandhi ji ke sath giraftar hue aur month ki jail kaati
allama ne wahin taleem paai aur apni siyasi zindagi ka aaghaz khilafat committee mein shamoliyat se kiya aur isi silsile mein jail bhi gaey
alipur jail mein in ki mulaqat calcutta corporation ke us waqt ke meyar mohammed usman se hui
halan ke mohammed ali jinnah aur mohammed ali jauhar mein siyasi ikhtelafat bhi qaiym rahe
bad azaa isi shehar mein november ko inteqal kar gaey

shahbaz sharif ko party ki qayadat sounphney ka faisla say pata chalta hai muslim leage ko sharif naam ki kashish par kitna yaqeen tha kay is be basi kay alam mein bhi inhein apni qayadat kay liye koi aur naam mouzo malom na huwa
may ko shahbaz sharif nay pakistan wapas aney ki koshish ki magar lahore kay alama iqbal bain ul aqwami hawai adde alama iqbal international airport say unhein wapas bhej diya gaya

august ko mian shahbaz sharif ko dobara agli muddat kay liye chuna gaya nawaz shrif kay mutabiq pakistani hukumat nay inhein apne bhai nawaz shahrif say mutanafir karne ki koshish bhi ki magar na kami hoi shahbaz sharif kay mutabiq woh nawaz sharif ko apne walid ki jaga samjhte hain

march na ahali kay case mein faisla in kay khalaf aney par shahbaz sharif ko kuch arsa kay liye iqtedar say alag bhi hona para lakin bad aza ye faisla khatam kardiya gaya aur woh aik bar phir suba punjab ki halat sudharne kay mission mein jet gaye in kay halqa e ahbab mein shamil afrad ka kehna hai kay shahbaz sharif is kam kay liye itni mehnat kar rahay hain kay in ki apni sahat kharab ho rahi hai
quaid e azam ko bhi chundrigar ki shakhsiyat par mukammal aitemad ibrahim ismail chundrigar ne september ko karachi mein wafaat paai
garmiyon ki chutiyon ke liyeh waten wapas aye to taleem adhori chor di
abhi shamuliyat ikhteyar na ki thi ke unhon ne aik roze apney dost ko alla angrez officer se jhar partey dekhi iss per angrez ki nokri se nafrat ho gaye

khan abdul ghaffar khan bacha khan ke barey bhai abdul jabbar khan doctor khan englishtan mein thay unhon ney abdul ghaffar khan ko waheen bolaya lakin walid sahib ney janey na deya keonkey doctor khan sahib ne waheen molazmat ikhteyar ker ke aik angrez khatoon se shadi ker li thi aur un walda ka kheyal tha ke bara beta to hat se geya ab chota beta bhi waheen jaker kisi angrez larki se shadi karey ga aur waheen ka ho rahey ga
iss tarah bacha khan taleem ke liyeh baher na jasake

mein ghazi amanullah khan ke khelaf afghanistan mein sorish huye to khan abdul ghaffar khan bacha khan aik wafd ke sath amanullah khan se mulaqat ke liye balochistan ke raste kandahar ja rahe thay ke unhein sibbi mein griftar kar liya gaya

mein sarhad mein angrezon ke khelaf azadi ka ahang intehai taiz ho gaya qissa khawani bazar mein firing huye hazaron ki tadad mein pakhtoon shaheed kiye gaye khan abdul ghaffar khan bacha khan ko atmanjai se peshawar atey huye griftar ker liya geya aur agley saalon mein abdul ghaffar khan sirf chand mah jail aur nazar bandiyon se azad reh sake
iss tehreek ki kamyabi par inhein aur sathiyon ko kai bar tashadud ka nishana banaya gaya aur paband slasal kiya gaya
mein app jail se chutey to issi baras phir mount marlow islahat ke khelaf tahreek chalane ke jurm mein pandrah hazar razakaron samait griftar huye
mein rahai pai to un ka punjab aur sarhad mein dakhla mamnun qarar diya
iss ke baad azadi ki jaddojehad mein congress ke sath rahe
mein hindustan chor do ki tahreek mein lathi charj ka shikar hoker app ki do paslian toot gayein
zakhmi halat mein app ko qaid mein dal diya gaya
mein karachi mein peoples party ki bunyad bacha khan ne rakhi lakin iss se pashter ke iss nauzaidah jamat ka dhancah khara hota june mein griftar ker liye gaye
january mein reha keye gaye to soba sarhad mein dakhla aur naqlo harkat ki azadi na thi
lakin one unit bana aur phir khan abdul ghaffar khan aur doctor khan sahib ke raste juda hogaye
june mein apney bhai doctor khan sahab hi ki wazarat aala ke zamane mein griftar ker liye gaye
baghawat aur inteshar phelane ilzam mein moqadmat qaim huay
january mein rahai pai to national awami party banai october mein mashalla nafiz hua to masaibka key daur ka agaz hua
aur ka darmeyani arsa khan abdul ghaffar khan ney jailon aur jila watni mein guzara
dekha jaye to unki pori zindagi hi jail ke chakker katte huye guzer gae
se tak koi ais arsa na tha jab app mosalsal teen saalon tak jail se bahar rahe hon
khan abdul ghaffar khan ne national congress ki hamnawai mein do qaumi nazere musalmanon ke judagana tashkhus aur qiyam pakistan ko kabhi tasleem nahein kiya
qiyam pakistan ke sath hi pakhtunistan ke daye ho gae
mein kabul chale gaye wahan se al india radio kabul per apni taqreron zareye se pakistan ki mokhalfat aur pakhtunistan qaim ki tahreek chalai
jab russian afwaj ne afghanistan per hamla kiya to unhon ne afghan mojahideen ki bhi hemayat nahein ki

agarchay khan abdul ghaffar khan zindagi phar apne pakistani hone se inkari rahey aur pakistan ko aik reyasat qarar detey rahey yahi waja hai key unhon ney dafan hone ke leye afghanistan ki sarzamine ka intekhab kiya iss hawale se unhein iss kitab mein shamil nahein kiya jana chahiye tha

may mein momin shahi key halqa se qaumi assembly key rukun chuney gae june ki hizb e ikhtelaf key leader muntakhib huae september ko pakistan democratic party ke leader baney march ko sadar yahya khan ne sheikh mujibur rahman ko jo ke awami league ka sarbarah thay mashriqi pakistan mein qaumi assembly ki nishashton seats mein se nishashtain seats hasil ki thin ghair ioni qarar de dia aur sheikh mujibur rahman ko griftar arrest kar liya iss waja se yeh hamaray azli dushman bharat se ja mila
yani bharti afwaj ko sheikh mujibur rahman ki hami mosllah tanzeem mukti bahini ka mokammal tawun hasil tha
april ko all india radio ne khaber nashar ki ke pakistan mein azad hukumat ke qayam ka alan kar diya gaya hai
bharat ko ruse aur bartania ki mukammal hamayat aur madad hasil thi
november ko bharat ki bari fauj ne mashriqi pakistan par hamla kar dia

november tak mashriqi pakistan mein jangi halat bahut kharab ho gaye to sadar yahya khan ne majburan bangali rehnuma nurul amin ko aburi daur ke lia wazir azam namzad kar deye aur unke sath zulfiqar ali bhutto ko naib wazir azam aur wazir e kharja bana diya
december ko saqoot e dhaka ka saneha huwa
pakistan ke do tukrey hojaney ka nurul amin ko be inteha sadma huwa
iss moqa par unhon ne kaha allah tala mujhey pakistan ke iss almiya se pehley hi iss duniya se utha leta
october ko nurul amin inteqal kar gaye

miss haseena wajid ne na sirf tamam opposition jamaton ko dara dhamka kar unhe qaid o band mien rakh kar unhe election ke amal se bahar rakh kar past ke parliamentary intekhabat mien kamiyabi hasil kar li hai

mubsireen yeh sawal utha rahe hain ke aaya haseena wajid siyasi madbar politician hone ke bawajood siyasi mukhalfeen se is qadar khaiyf kyun hain lekin inhe is ka jawab nahi mil raha hai
december mien jamat e islami ke markazi rehnuma abdul qadir ko phansi diye jane ke bad yeh umeed ki ja rahi thi ke haseena wajid aur in ke sathiyon ka gussa qadre thanda ho chukka ho ga

lekin ab lag raha hai ke jamat e islami ke sala ameer maulana mutee ur rehman nizami samait aik darjan se zaiyd aeham siyasi karkuno ko phansi ki saza suna kar bangladesh ko danista taur par tabahi ki janib dhakela ja raha hai

abdul qadir ki phansi par bangladesh ke siyasi aur samaji halqon hatta ke zaraey iblaagh ne bhi maslehatan khamoshi ikhteyar kar rakhi thi lekin taza sazaon ke faisle ke bad zaraey iblaagh ne bhi zaban khol di hai

bengali zaraey iblaagh ne ab ki baar haseena wajid ki policy par karhi tanqeed karte hue jamaat ke sarbarah maulana mutee urrehman nizami aur in ke deegar sathiyon ko saza e maut sunae jane ki khule alfaaz mien muzammat ki hai

siyasi samaji aur iblaaghi halqon ki janib se miss haseena wajid ko yeh mashwara diya ja raha hai ke wo apna zehni muaaiyna karaey kyun ke jis qisam ki siyasi inteqami policy inho ne apna rakhi hai wo kisi bhi soorat mien mulk o qaum ke mafaad mien nahi hai
opposition ke musalsal aehtejaaj siyasi inarki aur haseena wajid ki inteqami siyasat ke natijey mien maeshiyat badtareen tabahi se do chaar hui hai
